  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112577</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112577</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Števila od 5 do 10 - tombola</string>
            <string language="en">Numbers from 5 to 10 - bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahlen von 5 bis 10 - Bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nombres de 5 à 10 - bingo-test</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Números de 5 a 10 - bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Numeri da 5 a 10 - bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αριθμοί από 5 έως 10 - bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Números a partir del 5 a 10 - bingo</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vsak učenec dobi eno tablico. Učitelj vleče kartonočke. Učenci na svojih tablicah s kartončki, na katerih so številke od 5 do 10 prekrivajo polja. Tisti, ki prvi pokrije vseh pet polj in zakliče TOMBOLA, je zmagovalec.</string>
            <string language="en">Tables than can be used to play bingo - fun way to drill numbers from 5 to 10 (recognizing, counting, ...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">število</string>
            <string language="en">number</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">game</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tombola</string>
            <string language="en">bingo</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tabellen, als verwendet werden kann, Bingo zu 
spielen - Spaßmethode, Zahlen von 5 bis 10 zu bohren (das Erkennen, 
zählend...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableaux que peut être utilisé pour jouer le 
bingo-test - voie d'amusement de forer des nombres de 5 à 10 
(reconnaissance, comptant...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tabelas do que pode ser usado jogar o bingo - 
maneira do divertimento perfurar números de 5 a 10 (reconhecer, 
contando...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tabelle che può essere usato giocare il bingo - 
modo di divertimento perforare i numeri da 5 a 10 (riconoscere, 
contante...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πίνακες από μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να παίξει το
bingo - τρόπος διασκέδασης να τρυπηθούν με τρυπάνι οι αριθμοί 
από 5 έως 10 (αναγνώριση, που μετρά...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vectores que puede ser utilizado jugar el bingo -
manera de la diversión de perforar números a partir del 5 a 10 
(reconocimiento, contando...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bingo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nombre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bingo-test</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">número</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bingo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">numero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gioco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bingo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αριθμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παιχνίδι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">bingo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">número</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">juego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bingo</string>
          </keyword>
